## Group Activity

::: incremental
- Form pairs
- [Take notes](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1vglGVf4KvI8vvA6ThBezzVXg0UwAyGMBNJSDQ5HYnJg/edit?usp=sharing)
- Interview your partner to find out about a data visualization that they recently admired
- What did the visualization make clear that was unclear before?
- What were all the salient features used to communicate information?
- Present your partner's visualization
:::

## Group Activity 2

::: incremental
- Form new pairs
- pull up https://www.nytimes.com/2023/07/26/learning/over-75-new-york-times-graphs-for-students-to-analyze.html
- Find a visualization that uses a line plot
- Find a visualization that uses a histogram
- Find a visualization that uses a bar chart
- Find a visualization that uses a heat map
- Find a visualization that uses a scatter plot
- Find a visualization that uses something else
- Find a visualization that is too complicated
- Find a visualization that is collectively your favorite
